page.title: 06Cortachy Games,Cortachy
page.content: The games are held annually in {August}in a picturesque setting beside {South Esk}near{Cortachy Castle. Locals compete with professional athletes in track and field events.Throwing the{hammer}and tossing the{caber}are popular with spectators as are{Highland dancing competitions,the{dog show}and entertaining{dog races. In a large marquee{garden produce and{home baking}are beautifully displayed.After these have been{judged they are auctioned.There is a special section for{children's}entries.In other marquees{refreshments}are available.The{Girl Guides'}hamburger stall is always busy and{prizes}can be won at{side shows. To round off the day a{dance}is held in the evening.
